roleset.name: define (further), further defining, hedging, putting conditions on
roleset.note: QUALIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'qualify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. (from qualify.01-v)

example.name: qualify-v: all args
example.text: John qualified his statements as "just kidding, sheesh!"

roleset.name: measure up to
roleset.note: QUALIFY-V NOTES: Adjectival 'qualified' added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls masquerade-29.6. (from qualify.02-v)
QUALIFIED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from qualified.02-j)

example.name: qualify-v: arg2-for
example.text: Paribas said it will bid 1,850 francs a share for Navigation Mixte shares that *trace* qualify for a full yearly dividend...

example.name: qualify-v: arg2-as
example.text: He said the decision was the first in which a federal appeals court has ruled whether administrative government proceedings qualify as litigation.

example.name: qualified-j
example.text: Taxpayers should have the final say in deciding whether a government employee is qualified or not !
